title: Super
text: Really interesting place. Ancient history and crater by bomd from Second Word war. Of you are photograpfer, lets go there late afternoon.
place: World Heritage Network - Plain of Jars Adventure Tours

title: Inside karst area
text: We are here 3 days and we are titaly satisfied. Room and toalet is clean, wifi is ok and around us is limestones rock. Kong Lor Cave is about 800 m from accomodation. Menu in rastaurant is rich a prices is normal, not Hugh, not low. Staff is very friendly.

title: Good food
text: One of the best street restaurant around with wide offer of food. Wifi is quick and cafe is good and prices is lokal. Toilet is simply but clean. We are really satisfied.

title: Absolutly satisfaction
text: Really friendly staff, perfect service (laundry, breakfast, rood bar, strong wifi). No problém witr booxking bus ticket to Laos. Everywhere is clean, hot water in shower... Just perfect. Thanks a lot for this place.

title: Quick and quality
text: This is a really good restaurant with quality foot and willing staff. Price is OK.and Khmer food is excelent.

title: Terrible Sunday
text: The pine forest is nice, but dont go there i the sunday. It is a terrible expierience. Too much poople, every animals running deep to a forest. The most beautidull place was new pagoda. Entrannce fee is 5 dollars.

title: Beautidull place
text: We are was happy here. Its easy. Strong Khmer café, clean toalet, smiling staff and really beautidull building. And pancake is great. Perfect place for rest. Good start point or place for rest after trips into Kep national par.
place: Le Bout du Monde - Khmer Lodge

title: We not buy crab, we buy pepper
text: Nice local market, where is not only crab and fish, but we buy campot pepper. I you are loves of sea fruits, its place for you.

title: Super on scooter
text: Now is nature in Bokor National park, but after few years will be too much hotel and resort here. The best way for explore is on motorbike.

title: Perfect point of view
text: The church of Saint George is small, but nice. Top with one olive tree is really windy. Nice place for selfie. No admission.

title: History in stone
text: Perfect circle view on Athens and monumental temples and greece teathre. We are touch the Greek history. The price on winter is 10 euro.

title: Nice and modern
text: This modern by building and traditional by exposition. Perfect view through big windows on Acropole and to historical place under your legs. Price in winter is 5 euro.

title: Really friendly
text: Big portion of good gyros and really friendly staff. You can speak in greece, english, german and russian. It is good place for rest and lunch.

title: Good price
text: The hotel is clean, cheap and breakfast is including. The feta cheese on breckfast was really good. I like it. We are slept in really small room with small bathroom, AC and wifi. Our view from window is bad to the another office building (look the photo). Is really good choise for people with low budged.
